akn:section.akn:heading: Rights and remedies of the United States Government reserved

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3544. Rights and remedies of the United States Government reserved This subchapter does not affect a right or remedy the United States Government has by law to recover a tax, debt, or demand. (Pub. L. 97–258, Sept. 13, 1982, 96 Stat. 969.)
